name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Selected Custom Area with Presentation | OneClick

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developed for customer presentations and hiding some information. With this ext, you can hide any area of ​​any website you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't you want your customers to see your private data or other customer data while making a presentation?

For example;
You're going to show your Amazon Seller Central dashboard, but you don't want it to see your monthly revenue.
You're going to show your Facebook Meta panel, but you don't want them to see the total ad spend amount.
You will show your Google Ads panel, but you do not want it to see some campaigns
You will show your Google Adsense panel, but you do not want him to see some of your income.

All you have to do is install this plugin and select the areas you want to hide with the help of the mouse.
